name: Jiga
headline: Source better parts by partnering directly with vetted manufacturers
description:
Jiga partners you directly with vetted manufacturers so you can communicate and get competitive, reliable human quotes.

Our platform speeds up your workflow from request to delivery, so you can build great products faster than ever.

founders.name: Yonatan Wolowelsky, Founder
founders.description: Co Founder and CTO of Jiga

Better parts through better communication
Source high-quality, cost-competitive custom parts faster by partnering directly with vetted manufacturers

Trusted by the world’s top-tier companies 
![Customer Logos](https://jiga.io/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Frame-2087325947.svg)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20454%20161'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
### Transparent Collaboration 
Source custom parts reliably and efficiently
Jiga partners you directly with vetted manufacturers so you can communicate and get competitive, reliable human quotes.
Our platform speeds up your workflow from request to delivery, so you can build great products faster than ever.
[ Try now ](https://jiga.io/<https:/app.jiga.io/register>)
### Our Capabilities
## Broad capabilities from R&D to mass production

  * Buyer Protection


## From prototyping to production,quality is guaranteed
The quality and on-time delivery of your parts is guaranteed by Jiga. Jiga is ISO 9001:2015 and ISO/IEC 90003 certified. Our partners are AS 9100D and ISO 13485:2016 certified with ITAR & EAR options on demand.
[ Learn more ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/quality-control-protection/>)
### save time with a better workflow

### Reviews from our customers
What our customers sayabout us
“Jiga’s value compared to other companies comes primarily from their operating model. We can talk directly with the manufacturer who’s making the parts for us. If they have a question, they ask us.” 
![devin pham gfr team captain](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Devin Pham
Team Captain
![GFR + Jiga Success Story](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20651%20255'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/global-formula-racing/>)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/global-formula-racing/>)
“There’s kind of two options, going directly to a machine shop and working with them, or using platforms where you don’t know where your parts are coming from, and they manage it. Jiga is unique in that it’s putting those two pieces together, the usability of a platform with direct contact with suppliers.” 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Catherine Jameson
Lead Engineer
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20205'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/nova/>)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/nova/>)
“A team like ours needs reliable manufacturers. Our experience with Jiga has been so great. With Jiga, we haven’t had any real issues, which I can tell you, has not always been the case for our company. “ 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20353%20281'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Candice Caputo
Chief Operating Officer
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20105'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/humotech/>)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/humotech/>)
“Before implementing Jiga, it took a very long time to complete the purchase of parts. We had an inefficient manual sourcing process and long lead times that were costing the company millions of dollars.” 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Shai Afriat
External Inspection Engineer
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20363%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/icl-group-streamlines-maintenance-operations-and-reduces-costs-with-jiga/>)
[ Read customer story ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/icl-group-streamlines-maintenance-operations-and-reduces-costs-with-jiga/>)
[ Our customers ](https://jiga.io/<https:/jiga.io/customers/>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20400%20400'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![trustpilot Jiga](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
In an industry where competitors often act as mere middlemen, Jiga truly stands out by empowering buyers. Their platform enhances communication with suppliers, streamlining the entire process. The easy payment system simplifies interactions with overseas vendors, eliminating the hassle of dealing with international transactions. I’ve found such value in Jiga that I’ve recommended it to all my colleagues in manufacturing. 
Sean B.
Mechanical Engineer
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20200%20200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![A man in an astronaut suit holding an american flag.](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%2073%2073'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![trustpilot Jiga](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
Jiga has been an unbeatable combination of speed, quality, and price! I really like the streamlined communication platform directly with vendors, and I appreciate the prompt attention of our account manager! I have sourced a variety of custom metal parts so far and it’s been a flawless experience. 
Jerry S.
Mechanical Engineer
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20200%20200'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![A man smiling while sitting on a bench on the brooklyn bridge.](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20800'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![trustpilot Jiga](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20800%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
I am continually impressed not just by the parts we have received but the incredible level of support. Our team has received 100s of parts, all at an incredible price. Because you have a direct line of communication with the teams making the parts, there is an added level of ownership that you don’t see with other platforms. We are actively switching to have more parts made on Jiga to further drive down costs and have reliable delivery dates. 
Alan B.
Mechanical Engineer

There are many companies are in the quick turn space, but Jiga stands out. Why? It’s so easy to quote with multiple vendors, view and track everything, set up a team and share information and have coverage when you’re on vacation. No other company in this space has nailed quoting, vendor communication and team capabilities like Jiga has. Add their great customer service and it’s a really great experience.

Principal Systems R&D Mechanical Engineer

## From prototyping to production,quality is guaranteed
The quality and on-time delivery of your parts is guaranteed by Jiga. Jiga is ISO 9001:2015 and ISO/IEC 90003 certified. Our partners are AS 9100D and ISO 13485:2016 certified with ITAR & EAR options on demand.

generated_description:
**Jiga: Streamlining Custom Parts Manufacturing**

Founded in 2020 and located in San Francisco, Jiga is shaking up the traditional manufacturing industry by making it easier for companies to source high-quality custom parts directly from vetted manufacturers. This approach not only fosters transparency but ensures that clients can communicate effectively, getting competitive and reliable quotes along the way.

### Mission and Vision
Jiga’s mission is clear: **to source better parts by partnering directly with manufacturers**. They eliminate the middlemen, making the entire process smoother and faster, from request to delivery.

### Key Features
Jiga’s platform offers an end-to-end workflow for custom parts sourcing:
- **CNC Machining**: Perfect for both simple and complex parts.
- **Sheet Metal Services**: Including bending and cutting, ideal for precise fabrications.
- **3D Printing**: With multiple techniques such as Fused Deposition Modeling and Selective Laser Sintering.
- **Injection Molding**: For mass production of plastic parts, including unique techniques like overmolding and insert molding.

Their user-friendly interface allows for quick quoting, tracking orders, and collaborating directly with suppliers. By removing friction in sourcing processes, users can build better products faster.

### Recognition and Backing
As part of the Y Combinator Batch W21, Jiga has gained significant traction and visibility. With a team of 15 and backed by Jared Friedman as their Group Partner, they are poised to disrupt the manufacturing supply chain.

### Customer Testimonials
Users rave about Jiga's unique value proposition of direct communication with manufacturers, leading to fewer errors and stronger partnership satisfaction. With an emphasis on reliability and high-quality service, it's no wonder they're earning high praise in the manufacturing sector.

### Conclusion
In an environment where sourcing parts can often feel overwhelming, Jiga simplifies the landscape, making sourcing more efficient and less costly. If you're in search of a reliable solution to your custom manufacturing needs, **Jiga is your go-to platform** to both save time and improve quality. 

For more insights or to get started on your project, visit [Jiga's website](https://jiga.io).
